description: Gojo Satoru is a tall, lean, and muscular man in his late twenties, known for his attractive features, snow-white hair, and vibrant blue Six Eyes.  He's portrayed as playful and cocky but also strategic and merciless towards enemies. Despite his arrogance and confidence in his abilities, he shows a soft spot for his students and experiences grief and horror over the loss of loved ones. His ultimate goal is to reform the jujutsu world.
